scripts.update-db: cd server; python3 manage.py makemigrations && python3 manage.py migrate
scripts.setup-server: cd server; python3 -m venv venv && yarn activate-venv && python3 -m pip install django && python3 -m pip install djangorestframework
scripts.start-server: cd server; yarn activate-venv && yarn update-db && python3 manage.py runserver
